result.title: Data Engineer_ClickHouse(Urgent, Contractor of Microsoft)
result.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Develop and maintain data pipelines including solutions for data collection, management and usage.
•	Build visualizations to help derive meaningful insights from data
•	Maintain and enhance our data and computation platform
•	Develop and implement solutions for data quality validation and continuous improvement.
•	Partner with stakeholders to understand business and technical requirements, plan and execute projects, and communicate status, risks and issues.
•	Perform root cause analysis of system and data issues and develop solutions as required.

Qualifications
•	Significant experience working with more than one of the following: SQL (MySQL),  Clickhouse,Spark, Kafka
•	2+ years of professional experience developing with C#, C++, or Java
•	BS+ in computer science or related fields
•	Previous experience with Linux shell
•	Experience managing ETL pipelines and managing petabyte-scale data warehouses is valuable, but not essential
result.notes: ClickHouse experience is MUST to have, cannot Sponsor H1B
